creditline: Gift of the family of Esther Parada:  Adam Wilson, son; Margo Davion and Susan Peters, sisters; and Benjamin Glaser, brother
description: little boy wearing a sweater, torn or trimmed at the wrists; stone or cement wall and wooden door behind boy
inscription:
Inscription and Label

on back, in black ink: [(SUCRE, BOLIVIA) / STREET URCHIN]
markings: on back: bottom portion of photographer\'s address label
title: Street Urchin, Sucre, Bolivia
